title: Friday Fun Show: Bills-Rams Recap + Final Thoughts for Week 1
itunes:title: Friday Fun Show: Bills-Rams Recap + Final Thoughts for Week 1
description:
A virtual room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal are streaming LIVE for the Friday Fun Show! To start, we recap the Thursday Night Football match between the Bills and Rams (3:15). Then, the heroes share their final thoughts as we head into Week 1 (16:45), and we wrap up the show with a News Flash (28:40) and Heroes of the Week predictions (31:30).

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
